Message:
I can’t let anyone else
know about her.

I’m sure they’ll be just like
Mommy and Daddy and
call me a “crazy kid.”

If they said that,
she’ll come out again.

That’s why I hid her away
underneath my happy mask.

No one needs to know
the truth except for me.

She’s here for me,
and I’m here for her...

If I can bury everything
underneath this happy mask,
then no one...
